# Silver Service of Opulent Sustenance
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration; **CL** 7th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 8,000 gp

**Weight** 7 lbs.

**Description**

This finely made silver service (service for 4 along with a large serving tray, fluted flagon, and finely wrought goblets) magically creates highly nourishing food of the finest quality and the flagon pours a delicious wine to match the food chosen.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Create Food and Water (Spell)|create food and water]], [[Minor Image (Spell)|minor image]], water to wine*

**Cost** 4,000 gp

**Source:** The Living Sky, pg. xxx
